title: Capstone Chile Miners Strike as Record Copper Boosts Demands
description: The main union at a Capstone Copper Corp.-operated mine in northern Chile began a strike Friday as members push for a bigger share of the windfall from record-high metal prices.
content: The main union at a Capstone Copper Corp.-operated mine in northern Chile began a strike Friday as members push for a bigger share of the windfall from record-high metal prices.
